issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I came across an edge case which I think should really be fixed. By mistake I mistype the module which I wanted to include with the require function. The typo was a lowercase character instead of a uppercase character. Everything worked fine in the simulator but when I ran it on an iPad or iPhone the app crashed. After several hours of trail and error debugging by coincidence I saw the problem.

The expected result should in my opinion that the code should break also in the simulator.
fields.summary: iOS: require commonJS case sensitive on device not in simulator

comments.body: Tested with 2.0.1GA2 on an iPhone 3GS running iOS5, issue still reproducible.
Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
